title: Patch 4.17 Mega Bug Thread
body:
Hey guys! :D

The new patch is upon us, this could mean Elise  and Kha'Zix sneaked out (they are bugs, see what I did there?).  We can use your help! Help us find them!

Please only report bugs related to the [Patch 4.17](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-417-notes)

When reporting a bug, please include the following. It really helps us quickly identify the problem when we have these information, otherwise it could be very difficult to isolate the issue.

**Type of Bug: **Gameplay, Client, Crash
**Summary of the Bug: ** one to two sentences summarizing what the issue is
**Reproduction Steps:** the steps required to *CONSISTENTLY *recreate the issue
**Reproduction Rate:** If following the reproduction steps, what is the probability of recreating the issue
**Server: **The server which you found this issue - PBE, NA... etc

For performance related issues, please include your system specs. 

You can find an example of a good bug report [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/21gfV9sM-example-of-a-good-bug-submission)

Your help is much appreciated and Thank you! 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**List of Known Issues:**

* {{champion:96}}  **Kogmaw raw string is displayed
* {{champion:16}} Soraka does not have suggested item in ARAM
* {{champion:16}} Soraka bot does not respond when she is low on HP
* {{champion:266}}  Mecha Aatrox's Q sound animation when landing is off/muted

replies.body:
Type of Bug: Crash
Summary of the Bug: This is a Mac client bug (happening to friends that use Mac OSX as well) Crashes seemingly randomly in game, giving bugsplat and occassionally taking forever to log back into the game.
Reproduction Steps: Seemingly none (other than play the game on Mac)
Reproduction Rate: Random.
Server: NA
More Info: My current Mac OSX is version 10.9.2. At least one friend of mine is using the same version. I haven't been having this issue pre-4.17 so it's probably this patch.

Same issue. Happened very rarely before (only on 4.16). Following install of patch 4.17, the game has crashed 80-90% of games, **exactly once each game**. I play with a group of friends who all have macs and crashes on multiple machines happen **simultaneously**, but not always every machine at once. (We have four macs playing in the same match for multiple games. Sometimes its just me, sometimes two at once, etc.) One friend has a PC. No crashes for him. 

As a side note, I really appreciate you guys and feel like you do a good job dealing with a lot of issues. I know you guys have a lot on your plate, but I feel like this is a widespread issue and I haven't seen any Rioter response. Even a comment saying "We recognize this is happening, we don't know what it is, we'll look into it." would be really appreciated. It kinda feels like we aren't being heard. :/ 

Regardless, you guys make a great game and do a great job maintaining it. 

Thanks!
It's happening on Windows computers as well too. I run windows 7 and it's happening to me as well as my friends too.
I had the same problem as well. Already caused 2 ranked losses. {{item:3070}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3070}}
I feel you the same thing happened to me, and it looks like it is happening to a lot of people. I really hope that riot will respond soon.

This is happening to me, too. It started during 4.16 and would happen, perhaps, once a day. Since 4.17 it has started to do it maybe 1/5 games and sometimes twice in one game. 

Running OS X 10.8.5 on a  later 2008 iMac, 2ghz Intel Core 2 Duo with 3Gb RAM.

There is one consistent condition under which the bugsplat happens that I have noticed and that is it only ever happens while my champ is moving.

Happening a lot to me too i crashed already two times in one game just before like starting a week ago i only crashed once a day then today I've been crashing more than once per game riot pls fix this for Mac clients.

i had it occur pre-4.17 but it may be occuring more frequently now. its hard to tell. the last two games it has crashed, it has crashed 2x each game.

EDIT: Here is a [reddit thread](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2hndh5/what_is_the_deal_with_in_game_crashes_on_the_mac/) confiming a problem for many more Mac users.

This happens to me too. I've played on both my older macbook pro and my friend's new macbook air, and every single game I play now I crash one or two times. My internet connection is fast, but I can't play ranked any more because it affects the game significantly. I hope this gets fixed soon, I hate being responsible for my team's loss. :(
This is also happening to me, about once every game. Very frustrating, I hope this gets fixed soon {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Same here! Every game I crash at least once and it takes a while to reload back into game even though I'm running on one the 2014 Macbook pro.

This started happening to me in 4.16 infrequently but now in 4.17 it happens almost every game.  Ive been able to load back in immediately most of the time but sometimes it gets hung up on loading screen.

mid-2009 macbook pro running 10.9.4
Same issue. Intermittent crashing. Does not occur on my PBE account.

Running OSX 10.9.5 having the same issue, it's literally bug splatting every other match.

I'm running a hackintosh but not sure if that matters, I've played this game on it for the past 4 patches without a single crash, had about 6 thus far this patch.

I just crashed 3 times in a ranked game. We lost because it was basically a 4v5 :S 
I used to freeze up in a few places, and I think I maybe crashed once in 4.16, but this is just getting crazy now.

Type of bug: Crash
Summary of the Bug: Attempting to reconnect bug: WINDOWS VERSION! Game crashes about 5-6 minutes in the game and then everytime you attempt to reconnect will crash again after about a minute.
Reproduction Steps: Play a game and wait 5 minutes.
Reproduction Rate: About 1/2 of all games
Server: NA
Extra information: Once you get hit with this bug, you will be unable to play the current game no matter how many times you reconnect. May or may not happen in games following after it.

It's been happening to me for the last few days! It's so frustrating.

I start custom games just to see whether the servers are acting up. Ping turns out to be fine. Then I start a game and the lag shoots up, then falls back to 500 ping and starts the "attempting to reconnect" error. 

I connected my computer directly to the modem to get a solid connection, and the issue still kept happening. 

Very very frustrating, I hope LoL addresses this issue.
I have the same issue. I'm also on Windows. 100% of games though. It's made the game unplayable.

Re: iMac13,2 - i5 3.2Ghz - 32GB Ram - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680MX 2GB - SSD - OS X 10.9.5 (13F34) 

Type of Bug (A): Crash - LoL Client & Game
Summary of the Bug: LoL Client Crashes 4-5 times per game
Reproduction Steps: I unfortunately played a few Ranked games and the client crashed multiple times during gameplay - These happened unexpectedly with-or-without stress on the GPU or Memory
Reproduction Rate: 5\5 - See Attachment for Crash Report - I've collected 12 other logs reporting the same buffer overflow and a frequency of 5-15 minutes for every crash.
Server: NA

Type of Bug (B): LoL Patcher
Summary of the Bug: LoL Patcher Crashes while downloading\installing a clean patch (can no longer patch the game from scratch)
Reproduction Steps: Completely uninstall LoL and Remove all Riot\League\LoL components from ~Library - Download and install LoL client, launch LoL Patcher, download the patch, 5 min in, buffer overflow (crash).
Reproduction Rate: 3\3 - Patcher crashes every time when downloading the client

App crashes when running the following thread items (Same report after 3 attempts):

Server: NA

Id like to report that the bug splat and crash isnt just a mac thing it is also happening to me on pc, same exact problems i also have high ping spikes in crucial moments, also after every game i get bug splat error, and it is happening every game.

(Reproduce the bug)
jump into a fight and watch your game freeze 

 WINDOWS 8.1 
(CPU) Amd 8350 
(GPU) 7950 HD

Type of Bug: Gameplay
Summary of the Bug: It seems like Aatrox's auto attacks sometimes are invisible
Reproduction Steps: I use the aa smartcast that lets you aa the nearest target. After i Q on top of a minion, aatrox stands there but the damage goes through, meaning he auto attacks invisible. 
Reproduction Rate: i think if you have enough attack speed then using the smartcast aa after Q-ing to something, then you will be able to reproduce it fairly easy.
Server: NA
I Love This Champion. Please Make Him Perfect. PS. Fix his E too. if you are aa a minion then use E, sometimes it doesnt register.

Windows 8 user here. I have fallen victim to the "attempting to reconnect" bug, but the game simply keeps crashing if I try and leave the game in an attempt to solve this. I cannot play League until there is a fix for this, as I am causing too many other people to lose their matches all thanks to a bug. Please address this issue soon Riot; I know the World Championships are going on, but this has been a known issue so a fix would really be appreciated.

Type of Bug: Crash
Summary of the Bug: OSX Crashes constantly when Playing Ranked Gameplay, Gives Bugsplat
Reproduction Steps: Queue up for a game on OSX, watch game crash every couple minutes.
Reproduction Rate: Constant
Server: NA

Other Info: Running 10.9.4 OSX on a mid 2012 Macbook pro with Retina Display. I have never had this issue before this patch.

Type of Bug: Aatrox Animations
Summary of the Bug: Justicar Aatrox Ultimate is hella bugged and Mecha Aatrox's Q sound animation when landing is off/muted
Reproduction Steps: Ult with Justicar Aatrox and you will see hilarity. Use Mecha Aatrox's Q and there is no landing sound animation
Reproduction Rate: Do it once with each skin and it will be 100% reproduced
Server: NA
{{champion:266}} {{item:3070}} {{summoner:3}}

The LoL website hasn't been updated for two patches now.

* [Cassiopeia's page](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/cassiopeia/) has incorrect information
* Azir still doesn't have a [champion page](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/azir/)
* Information about [teleport](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/summoners/spells/) doesn't explain about the cooldown reduction part of the ability
* [Kha'zix](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/khazix/) doesn't have all skins listed
* The [portraits](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/) for many champions are outdated 
* The lore for a few champions are conflicting with in-client info(An example being [Skarner](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/skarner/))

Type of Bug: Crash & unable to reconnect

Summary of Bug: Randomly crashing & when trying to reconnect it crashes again. The only way to get back into the game is put ctrl+alt+delete, force quit league, and then relog.

Reproduction Steps: Play a ranked game.

Reproduction Rate: Every game.

Server: NA

I am using Windows 8.1

The mac bug isnt just for macs. I know myself and many others who run windows 8.1, 8, and 7 are having these issues, while the friends i normally play with don't seem to be affected. I literally cannot play the game because if i do it will auto dc me for like the entire time. In my match history, all but the twisted treeline and aram losses were due to this wierd crash bug. Summary: Attempting to Reconnect, but whenever i manually reconnect then it just crashes again.
Reproduction: Press play, summoner's rift, enter the game.
Server: NA
I had a ranked soloq game as twitch where i literally could not connect the entire game. That felt great...

Type of Bug: Crash
Summary of Bug: Constant crashes after getting to 100% in loading screen. If I do manage to get into game, I get a sudden lag spike to about 1,000+ (I usually have 90-110) and then I get stuck at 500 ping with "Attempting to Reconnect." Recorded as a "Leave." 
Reproduction Steps: When I restart my client and reconnect to the game, I crash after getting to 100%. When I restart my computer, I can get into the game but after 5 minutes, I get stuck at 500 ping with "Attempting to Reconnect." It never reconnects. 
Reproduction Rate: First game was fine. ALL games after that had this problem. 
Server: NA

More info: Windows 8.1. Did not experience this problem before Patch 4.17.

Type of Bug: Crash
Summary of Bug: Happened mid game (well 5 times already during the day) freezes then crashes unexpectedly. Its pretty much random at times. Wasn't doing anything in particular (playing Tristana at the time, froze when mid-hop)
Reproductive Steps: none just play.
Reproduction Rate: Random
Server: NA
More info: Running on a Mac OSX version 10.9.4. This problem started happening when on 4.17 on Friday, September 27th. Here is the bugs plat number you guys wanted

Crash Report #192522

Hope this gets fixed realllllyy soon.

Type of bug : Gameplay
Summary of bug: Garens Passive is healing over the max that it should at lvl 16
Server: NA
More details: Garens passive is starting at 2% like it should at lvl 16 at lvl one. by the time he lvls to 16 the passive heals 10% max health per 5

Garen's passive has been changed to:
>HEALTH REGENERATION 0.4% maximum health per second at all levels ⇒ 0.4% / 0.8% / 2.0% maximum health per second at levels 1/11/16

If we are talking about how the health regeneration is not per 5 seconds, that would most likely be a different discussion.

Summary: Bugplatting on Mac game client 10.9.4 multiple times per game. 2012 Macbook Pro, never had any bugs plat problems at all.

Reproduction: Can't seem to reproduce, seems pretty random. Pretty much what a lot of other people have been seeing.

Server: NA

Type of Bug: Crash
Summary of the Bug: This is a Mac client bug (happening to friends that use Mac OSX as well) Crashes seemingly randomly in game, giving bugsplat and occassionally taking forever to log back into the game.
Reproduction Steps: Seemingly none (other than play the game on Mac)
Reproduction Rate: Random.
Server: NA
More Info: My current Mac OSX is version 10.9.2. At least one friend of mine is using the same version. I haven't been having this issue pre-4.17 so it's probably this patch.

Type of Bug: Game Crash
Summary: Occurs during matches on Mac client. The majority of the time it occurs in ranked.
Reproduction Steps: Play a ranked rift on Mac. (solo que usually)
Rate: Almost every game (happens every game for me)
Server: NA
More Info: This has not be a problem since the iLoL client so it is tied to something in this patch

Type of bug: Crash
Summary of bug: everytime I try to enter a game it doesn't connect and sais "The game has crashed please try to reconnect to game" I try to reconnect and it does the same thing
Reproduction Steps: Happens after we pick our champions I don't even see the loading screen I goes black then exits out.
Reproduction Rate:It happens constantly I cant get connected to a game at all.  It worked last night and hasn't worked since I downloaded the patch tonight.
Server: NA
... still having this problem.... any help would be great... im sure the people who keep having to play with 4 would appreciate it too

Type of Bug : Gameplay
Summary of Bug: In Aram playing Soraka the recomendet item page is emty
Reproductive Steps : difficult to say its aram, not often you get the same champ again
Reproductive Rate : -
Server : EU

Not sure if this is a bug but

Type of Bug : Client
Summary of Bug: In the client, haven't checked in game the champion description for cutthroat still says it silences
Reproductive Steps : Log on go to champions either in shop or on profile and select talon and then select abilities.
Reproductive Rate : every time
Server : NA

Type of Bug:  Gameplay

Summary of the Bug:  Aredent Censer granting attack speed to holder and global team movement speed.

Reproduction steps:  Step 1, buy Ardent Censer, step 2, watch your entire team's movement speed and your attack speed go up, step 3, profit.

Reproduction Rate:  3 out of the 3 games I've build Ardent Censer on, this has happened.  Not enough to say with 100% certainty that it's happening all the time, but I don't like those odds.

Server:  NA

4.16
"In this patch we've fixed a bug responsible for creating errors during the patching process. We've also added crash logging to the patcher as another tool to help us discover, track and fix issues going forward."

"Fixed a bug that sometimes prevented new patches from properly updating game files"
"Players can now submit logs if the patcher crashes"


These 3 things were said, which are great for what I need to use them for notifying problems, but nothing seems to work. These changes might have something to do with it?


4.17
Type of Bug: Patcher crashes

Summary of the Bug: I was in the middle of a game, playing{{champion:236}} There also was a teammate{{champion:112}} and an enemy {{champion:16}}  when I got a bugsplat error. It had happened twice. One time, able to reload and continue playing, the second time, completely froze. Thats when the patcher started crashing. I have no clue whether these two problems are related, but I have never got a bugsplat error in the 3 years I have been playing.

Reproduction Steps: Run the patcher, as soon as it pops up, I get a notification saying: update failed, with a "continue" button and "send logs". Then try pressing launch, disappearing like normal but nothing happens. Im not even able to play a game to see if I get more bugsplats or errors let alone login

Reproduction Rate: 100%, I even tried the repair tool and watched it. Everything seems normal except that notification saying I get update failed.

Type of Bug: Gameplay
Summary of the Bug: Celestine Soraka's hair moves awkward when she walks
Reproduction Steps: Start a game with Soraka using her Celestine skin and order her to move.
Reproduction Rate: (It happens all the time since that is her walking animation)
Server: LAN

I suppose it's an error, since her hair doesn't move like that in her base, Dryad or Divine skins, and it didn't use to move like that (plus it defies physics).
It isn't exactly a priority issue, though, but it gets on my nerves and keeps me from using my favorite skin :c

Also, she doesn't disappear when dead.

Type of Bug: Gameplay
Summary of the Bug: Celestine Soraka's body stays on the ground after death
Reproduction Steps: Start a game with Soraka using her Celestine skin and die.
Reproduction Rate: (It happens all the time since that is her death animation)
Server: LAN
Correct me if I'm a wrong, but don't all champs leave their corpse on the ground until they respawn?

type of bug: gameplay

Summary of bug: I'm not sure if it is a bug or something to be concerned about, but i just played two games in a row with people that all had ghost and heal and just kept running around just basic attacking with the rare ability like trained bots.
 Also i'm pretty sure this wasn't just the same team trolling us 2 times because we had someone on our team doing the same thing.... it is really creepy and I don't have any idea what the heck just happened.

server: NA
Welcome to Soloqueue, Where everything is made up, and the Points don't matter

Type of Bug: Crash
Summary of Bug: Frequent bugsplats, possibly connected to Soraka.
Server: NA
More details: I can't say for certain whether or not it's really related to Soraka, but I think I've gotten bugsplatted in almost, if not every game I play Soraka, but never in games she's not played. Crash log attached for reference.
System: Mac Mini 2011 (2.3 GHz i5), OSX 10.9.4

I am having problems patching because my virus scanner keeps blocking a specific file. "jpatch.exe" 

Should i be concerned at all about this?
We are getting reports that Avast is blocking League of Legends, and we have an engineer looking into it. We don't have report of this issue from another other products.

Bugsplat at end of ARAM games since the patch: 


Type of Bug: Gameplay
Summary of the Bug: at the end of game I'm playing in ARAM, I'm getting a bug splat right at game end, I'm not getting any end game stats, says game has crashed.
Reproduction Steps: play ARAM, see what happens at end game
Reproduction Rate: it's happened each game I've played, which is two games in a row.
Server: NA
